summary: REQ-2 (hero background + dark overlay) appears implemented in ServicesPage.tsx, but REQ-1 (adding the actual uploaded image file under frontend/public/assets/generated/) is not shown in the diff. There are also unrequested changes to project metadata/summary files.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the uploaded image as a static asset under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` matching the required filename so Services page can reference it via a static path.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added files, and no asset file appears under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` in the changes list.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx references `/assets/generated/services-hero-bg.dim_1024x1536.png` but no corresponding asset file is added

hallucinated_features.description: Updates to project tracking/metadata (new_feature_requests entries and statuses)
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for adding a static asset and updating the Services hero section styling; it does not request edits to project_state.json.

hallucinated_features.description: Edits to a generated/summary file listing unrelated frontend changes
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request updating or generating a `frontend-file-summaries.txt` file.
